description:
<p>The surgical division has a number of vacancies within its surgical wards for Assistant Practitioners. Surgery covers both surgical emergency admissions through St Mawes and elective surgical admissions both in-patient and day cases through Theatre Direct and The Surgical Admissions Lounge (SAL).<br /><br />We treat our patients with a multi-professional approach, ensuring that their dignity is at the forefront of the care we provide. So if you enjoy working with a welcoming and supportive team and want to make a difference to each patient’s experience of the NHS, you will fit right in with us.<br /><br />We are looking for Assistant Practitioners for the St Mawes Unit who will assist us in delivering high quality care in what can sometimes be a very busy environment. The post holder must be able to demonstrate excellent communication skills, leadership, a positive outlook, enthusiasm and the ability to learn and develop new skills.<br /><br />Applicants must have successfully achieved the Foundation Degree in Healthcare Practice or equivalent and must have experience in a healthcare environment.<br /><br /><strong>There are full time (37.5 hours per week) and part time posts available.</strong><br />For further details / informal visits contact:</p>
<p>Catherine Blunsdon on Tel: 01872253032</p>
title: Assistant Practitioner
